Dialogue.Page: Hey, hatchling! We've detected an unusual signal from a nearby celestial body, so we sent Riebeck to investigate.
We don't know yet, but what we DO know is that it's Nomai in origin! Isn't that wild?
Here we are in a completely different solar system, and still the Nomai have left their mark.
Do you still have that translator tool? Perhaps you could <color=orange>go give Riebeck a hand</color>?
You know how to find them.
It seems to be coming from the <color=orange>large blue planet</color>. We can't seem to pinpoint it closer than that.
